metadata.description: Moralis API skills marketplace - plugins for Web3 Streams API and EVM/Solana data APIs. v1.1.0 adds: Net worth, PnL tracking, token analytics, security scores, DEX snipers, 5 new chains (Flow, Ronin, Lisk, Sei, Monad), and enhanced query client with pagination helpers.

plugins.name: web3-api-skills
plugins.description: Comprehensive Web3 development suite including wallet (net worth, PnL, stats, ENS), token (analytics, security scores, snipers), NFT (floor price history), DeFi, blockchain APIs, and specialized utilities for 40+ EVM chains + Solana

plugins.name: streams-api-skills
plugins.description: Moralis Streams API for real-time blockchain event monitoring with webhooks and custom filters. v1.1.0 adds: native balance streaming, enhanced history replay, POST/DELETE/PATCH support, and 5 new chains (Flow, Ronin, Lisk, Sei, Monad).
